name: Moon Defender
description:
Moon Defender is a game about survival... and blowing stuff up, particularly the stuff that's trying to smash into your moon. the asteroids will come faster and faster the longer you play until you finally are destroyed.

This is my first game that I have posted on Itch.io and I created in in 48 hours all by myself so I hope you enjoy it!

The controls are simple left click to shoot and aim with your mouse.

Update:

Fixed all the bugs and added a difficulty slider
